PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-01642008-01-29,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LINDA HUTCHISON of Kentville, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Peter Gordon Cathcart.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of LINDA HUTCHISON of Kentville, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Peter Gordon Cathcart.
